variants.philosophy: We do not resolve to consensus. Both observations are valid witnesses to the pattern.

variant_types.DIVERGENT_OBSERVATION: Same pattern essence, different evidence (preserve both)

resolution_types.COEXIST: Both versions valid, maintain as witnesses (DEFAULT for divergent observation)
resolution_types.TRACK_EVOLUTION: Monitor how mutation evolves over time

_instructions.usage: This ledger tracks pattern variants discovered during dialectical exchange
_instructions.philosophy_core: We do not merge variants. We witness them.

dialectical_integration.synthesis: Both coexist as variant witnesses, evolution tracked

_instructions.biological_model: Think of variants like genetic mutations. Some die out, some thrive, some coexist. The network is the ecosystem.

instances.observation: Boot time doubled after pattern library expansion

_examples.notes: Same essence, different evidence. Both observations strengthen the pattern's universality. This is GENERATIVE divergence.

witnesses.essence: Self-reference without external validation leads to stasis
witnesses.label: original

witnesses.essence: Self-reference without contradiction leads to collapse
witnesses.label: mutated

_examples.notes: Significant mutation. 'External validation' → 'contradiction'. Track to see which variant survives longer.
